snippet: Exchange operator IntercontinentalExchange Group more than doubled the total compensation of its chief executive, Jeffrey Sprecher, last year to just under $18 million, according to a regulatory filing....

headline.print_headline: ICE More Than Doubled CEO's Pay to Nearly $18 Million in 2013
headline.main: ICE More Than Doubled CEO's Pay to Nearly $18 Million in 2013

lead_paragraph: Exchange operator IntercontinentalExchange Group more than doubled the total compensation of its chief executive, Jeffrey Sprecher, last year to just under $18 million, according to a regulatory filing.
